message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $135. This exceptional value includes not only the product itself but also exclusive access to our VIP customer support and a special gift. We believe this offer presents a great opportunity for you to enjoy the benefits of our product while saving compared to its market value of $120.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you're providing, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you be able to offer the product at $120, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay?
